previous.excerpt: Bunnyshell is a self-service DevOps automation platform that helps teams cut downtime and deliver reliable applications and services at high velocity.
previous.title: Bunnyshell - Self-service DevOps automation for any application

localize.description: Bunnyshell是一个自助式的DevOps自动化平台，可以帮助团队缩短停机时间，并高速交付可靠的应用程序和服务。
localize.tagline: 针对任何应用的自助式DevOps自动化

localize.description: Bunnyshell是一個自助式的DevOps自動化平臺，可以幫助團隊縮短停機時間，並高速交付可靠的應用程序和服務。
localize.tagline: 針對任何應用的自助式DevOps自動化

next.excerpt: Introducing Smart Components in Framer, a new standard for interactive component design. From complete navigations and buttons with multiple states to nested hover effects, build anything visually and in just a few clicks—no code required. https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF
next.title: Smart Components by Framer - Design interactive components with multiple variants

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能组件，这是一个交互式组件设计的新标准。从具有多种状态的完整导航和按钮到嵌套的悬停效果，只需点击几下就能建立任何视觉效果--无需代码。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。
localize.tagline: 设计具有多种变体的交互式组件

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能組件，這是一個交互式組件設計的新標準。從具有多種狀態的完整導航和按鈕到嵌套的懸停效果，只需點擊幾下就能建立任何視覺效果--無需代碼。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。
localize.tagline: 設計具有多種變體的交互式組件
